nodes.text: The Fall of Cloud City was a web enhancement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published on Wizards.com on September 13, 2001.
The game recommends the players modify the base characters of Star Wars: Invasion of Theed Adventure Game, excluding the Jedi.
During the Subjugation of Cloud City, a group of adventures who came to Cloud City must save Doctor Shemza from the Galactic Empire.
The adventurers encounter Doctor Shemza at the landing platform when a group of Jabba's thugs tried to abduct him.
If the characters succeed in rescuing Shemza, they reunite and escape with his contact.
